entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Barrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:17 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 11:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -4.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -5.3°C
Wind: ENE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
